alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:35PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Webb County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1034 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Gilson Groves, or 28 miles south of Carrizo Springs, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Webb County. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 668 and 674. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
